textos_fuente.text: Bluegrass Festival Calendar ‚Äì Bluegrass Country Skip to content Listener-supported radio playing American roots music 24/7 Donate Listen Facebook X YouTube Instagram Home About Bluegrass Country Radio Bluegrass Country Foundation History of Bluegrass on WAMU/Bluegrass Country Volunteer FAQ Program Guide Shows Schedule How to Listen Radio Replay Archive Player Festival Calendar Support Support Bluegrass Country Radio Be a Bluegrass Country Sustainer Be a Corporate Sponsor Donate a Vehicle Donate Real Estate Planned Giving Contact Donate Listen Search for: Home About Bluegrass Country Radio Bluegrass Country Foundation History of Bluegrass on WAMU/Bluegrass Country Volunteer FAQ Program Guide Shows Schedule How to Listen Radio Replay Archive Player Festival Calendar Support Support Bluegrass Country Radio Be a Bluegrass Country Sustainer Be a Corporate Sponsor Donate a Vehicle Donate Real Estate Planned Giving Contact Us Donate Listen Bluegrass Festival Calendar Updated August 15, 2025 Refresh this page to make sure you‚Äôre getting the latest updates. Welcome to the Bluegrass Country festival calendar.¬† We list bluegrass, old time and Americana festivals at date, in the US and around the world. This year we‚Äôre listing festivals outside the US on the same monthly pages as US festivals. If you know about a festival that isn‚Äôt on our list, please send us the information . ‚ÄúBluegrass festival‚Äù is a broad category, encompassing old time fiddlers‚Äô conventions, family weekends, street fairs, mega-music festivals and everything in between.¬† We‚Äôve provided links to the festival websites so you can check the lineups, schedules, admission fees, facilities, whether there‚Äôs camping, jamming etc. Our calendar only lists events when we have confirmed dates, preferably from a current secure website or Facebook page .¬† Check back often, as we add new events when we find them. So pack up your instruments, load the camper and hit the road! UPDATES. Check the calendar for details.¬† Our online calendar starts with the current month. Click here to order a printable (PDF) copy of the calendar, listing over 560 festivals in 2025. August New listing: Lake Cumberland Bluegrass Festival in Kentucky September New listings: White Squirrel Bluegrass+ Festival in Illinois; Plymouth Frankly Bluegrass Music Festival in California; Moorestown Bluegrass Festival in New Jersey If you‚Äôd like to volunteer some time to help us keep this calendar up to date, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. E-mail calendar@bluegrasscountry.org . September October November/December September SEPTEMBER 4-6 Payson Fiddle & Food Truck Festival , Payson, AZ 4-6 Twin Oaks Fall Bluegrass Festival , Hoboken, GA 4-6 Watermelon Pickers‚Äô Fest , Berryville, VA 4-6 Coal Miners Appreciation Music Festival , McClure, VA 4-7 Oldtone Music Festival North Hillsdale, NY 5-6 Mountain Song Festival , Brevard, NC 5-6 Bluegrass & Chili Festival, Wagoner, OK 5-6 Rockbridge Mountain Music & Dance Festival , Buena Vista, VA 5-7 Bluegrass on the Snake , Rigby, ID 5-7 Cameron Bluegrass Festival , Cameron, WI 6 White Squirrel Bluegrass+ Festival Olney, IL Facebook 7 Highlands Bluegrass Festival & Crafts Fair , Sloatsburg, NY 9-13 AmericanaFest , Nashville, TN 11-13 Buffalo River Bluegrass Festival Jasper, AR Facebook 11-13 Hoppin‚Äô John Old-Time & Bluegrass Fiddlers‚Äô Convention , Pittsboro, NC 11-13 Mohican Bluegrass Festival , Glenmont, OH 11-14 Jerusalem Ridge Bluegrass Celebration , Rosine, KY 12-13 Backyard Bluegrass Festival , Sullivan, IL Facebook 12-13 Walnut Hills Farm Bluegrass Festival Huber Heights, OH Facebook 12-13 Nine Mile Bluegrass Festival , Pikeville, TN 12-14 Pickin‚Äô in the Pines , Flagstaff, AZ 12-14 Top of the Swan Bluegrass Camp and Jam-bo-ree Ferndale, MT 12-14 Silver Bay Mountain Music Festival , Silver Bay, NY 12-14 Bluegrass & Butterflies , Elkton, OR 12-20 Poppy Mountain Music Festival , Morehead, KY 13 Moorestown Bluegrass Festival Moorestown, NJ 13 Carolina Bible Camp Bluegrass Festival , Mocksville, NC 13 Red River Roots Bluegrass & Folk Festival Colfax, ND 13 Rock Castle Folk ‚Äòn Bluegrass Fest , Hendersonville, TN 13-14 East Troy Bluegrass Festival , East Troy, WI 14 Pickin‚Äô in the Rockies , Loma. Palatka Bluegrass Festival
Location ‚Äì 380 Boys‚Äô Ranch Road Palatka, FL 32177 Event Details Palatka Bluegrass Festival Palatka Bluegrass Festival Location ‚Äì 380 Boys‚Äô Ranch Road Palatka, FL 32177 February 13, 2025 @ 12:00 pm ‚Äì February 15, 2025 @ 10:00 pm You will receive a confirmation email from Evans Media Source when we process your order. We hold all tickets at the gate . The best available reserved seat will be assigned when your order is processedor you can call the ticket office at 386-385-3500 to request a seat. General seating is first come first served. Bring a lawn chair for VIP, Reserved, or General Seating. Credit card fees are non-refundable. There is a $10 non-refundable fee on all tickets. Advance pricing ends 1/4/2025. Children under 12: FREE ADMISSION with Adult Ticket Purchase. No refunds or credits after 1/4/2025 . Call Rodeheaver Boys Ranch at 386-328-1281 for Campsite reservations . tgibb@rbrhs.org December 2027 Memone Crystian Red Bank mcrystian@rbrhs.org December 2025 Mark Taylor Red Bank mtaylor@rbrhs.org December 2025 John Garofalo Red Bank jgarofalo@rbrhs.org December 2025 Nicole Woods Red Bank nwoods@rbrhs.org December 2026 Ursula Henry Shrewsbury uhenry@rbrhs.org December 2027 Jennifer Lipp Shrewsbury jlipp@rbrhs.org December 2026 Amanda Galante Little Silver agalante@rbrhs.org December 2027 Louis B. Moore, Ph.D. Superintendent lmoore@rbrhs.org Debra Pappagallo School Business Administrator /Board Secretary dpappagallo@rbrhs.org 2024-2025¬† DISTRICT GOALS 1.Promote excellence and equity for all students by expanding opportunities, boosting achievement and fostering a school culture that values inclusion and recognizes the value of diversity. 2. Utilize resources and form partnerships that support programs that prepare all students for success in a range of postsecondary pursuits including college, pathways toward earning industry-valued credentials/certifications and apprenticeships, as well as engagement in national and community service. 3. Promote student achievement and success by prioritizing efforts to strengthen the instructional program and Tier 1 supports. 4. Strengthen school-community relations. 2024-2025¬† BOARD OF EDUCATION GOALS 1. Continue to engage with the community to support a more active dialogue with districts and communities and gain a richer sense of their priorities. 2. Create, implement and report on progress of the district's Strategic Plan. 3. Continue to support the efforts of school and district administration to advance Social-Emotional Learning (SEL) to support the growth of all students. 4. Continue to improve Board performance by enhancing inter-board communications and committing to operational effectiveness. The Board of Education is composed of nine citizens elected from our constituent districts. Representatives are elected on the basis of constituent population - two from Little Silver, five from Red Bank, and two from Shrewsbury. As Board members, they establish policies and oversight for the Red Bank Regional School District. Board members fulfill three-year terms and serve the residents and children of the Red Bank Regional school district without pay. Board members make important decisions that affect the educational offerings for our children, but welcome and encourage the public to take an active role in the educational process as well. Members of the community can attend all Board meetings to express opinions. 101 Ridge Road Little Silver NJ 07739 732-842-8000 732-842-4868 Get Directions Social Media Facebook (opens in new window/tab) Twitter (opens in new window/tab) Site Map The Red Bank Regional District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, or disability in its programs, services, or activities. Please contact Whitney Ooms, Affirmative Action Officer/Title IX Officer, 101 Ridge Road, Little Silver, NJ 07739, (732) 842-8000 x 350, wooms@rbrhs.org. New RVers... simply FILL OUT this brief form below, then click SUBMIT. One of our office personnel will email you with your updated site details. Reminder: Each RV site includes electric (30 or 50 amps, your choice) & water.¬† During the festival, An RV gray/black lines draining services comes every morning about 10am to our RV Park providing the service of RV black & gray lines sewage removal (for a fee). February 2026 RENEWAL ONLY RENEWAL November 2025 ONLY NEW Registration NOV25 & FEB26 FIRST & LAST NAME Street Address City, State, Zip Phone ARE YOU A REAL HUMAN?  TYPE  999 Email Address Please Check Applicable Please Check Applicable "NEW REGISTRATION" (for November 2025 OR February 2026 Festival) EARLY ARRIVAL (Sunday, Monday or Tuesday) Before Festival Approval Needed 50 AMP Required Submit Bluegrass Music Festival 2025 | 2026 | November 6th, 7th and 8th, 2025 ‚Äî The Annual November Palatka Bluegrass Festival ‚Äì COMING @TheRanch Prior festivals featured 13+ acts including TLarry Efaw & BGM; Lonesome River Band; Dan Tyminski; The Atlantic City Boys; Gordon Mote; The Malpass Brothers; The Gibson Brothers; Rhonda Vincent & The Rage; Larry Stephenson Band; MC Sherry Boyd; The Burnett Sisters Band; Remedy Tree; Billy Lee Cox; Wayne Taylor/Appaloosa and more‚Ä¶ Rodeheaver Boys Ranch is host to two of the top Bluegrass Music Festivals in the country each year in February and November . ¬†With top bluegrass musicians, the Festival is a huge draw to the Ranch. Thousands of music lovers flock to the Ranch. ¬†The boys are active participants in the activities and they help direct traffic within the Ranch grounds, pick-up trash & serve in the cafeteria. For more information about the Festivals held at Rodeheaver Boys Ranch or questions about concert tickets, Evans Media Group, 386-385-3500, is handling the BlueGrass concert tickets click here , while The Boys Ranch, 386-328-1281, is handling the RV site reservations.
